title: EPPS 6356 Data Visualization
text:
Welcome to my personal website, which has been created as part of the EPPS 6356 Data Visualization class for the 2024 Fall semester at The University of Texas at Dallas.

4. Write a critique on a chart in published work (book/article/news website)
South Korea Population Density and Demographics



visualization example


Critique
Strengths:

Clarity and Readability: The visualizations are clear and easy to read, with well-chosen colors and labels that make the data accessible.
Interactive Elements: The use of interactive elements allows users to explore the data in more depth, which can enhance understanding and engagement.
Comprehensive Data: The visualizations cover a wide range of demographic data, providing a comprehensive overview of South Korea’s population.

Areas for Improvement:

Overcrowding of Information: Some charts may appear cluttered with too much information, which can overwhelm the viewer and make it difficult to extract key insights.
